page.title: 13Boshaw Whams Resr.Hade Edge
page.content: Boshaw Whams Reservoir is at Hade Edge.It was not built for drinking water but to supply water to the mills nearby.They now use the reservoir for {sailing and fishing.}Recently the rent for the Yorkshire Water Authority went up from Â£12 per year to Â£900.Each angling member can only get two fish per visit which must be at least 12" in length.500 trout are put in the reservoir every month during the fishing season.The angling club was opened 99 years ago and only 75 people are allowed to join.It costs Â£50 to join and Â£50 per year.You are allowed to use bait or you can fly-fish,but you are not allowed to fish in boats or swim in the reservoir.On the same water is a sailing club which opened in 1959.In this club there are about 200 sailing members,but only 50 members can have boats.
